comment: Those who are pining for Iqbal day , if you really want to honor your heroes , please honor Abdus Salam & Iqbal Masih too !
amr:
# ::snt Those who are pining for Iqbal day , if you really want to honor your heroes , please honor Abdus Salam & Iqbal Masih too !
(h / honor-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Abdus"
                        :op2 "Salam"))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Iqbal"
                        :op2 "Masih")))
      :condition (w / want-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (h2 / honor-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (h3 / hero
                        :poss y))
            :ARG1-of (r / real-04))
      :mod (t / too))
